page.title: 07Home life and leisure.
page.content: {Home Life And Leisure Activities It can be seen from the graph that this is an affluent area. The majority of homes are detatched and 92% of the homes are owner occupied,our survey also showed that more than 50% of the homes had 4 bedrooms and more people had 2 cars than 1. Our questionaire on leisure activities revealed that the most popular pursu- its were watching television,gardening and reading.These were enjoyed by more than 70% of those questioned and DIY is practised by 52%. The most popular sports are swimming, running,golf,squash and badminton. There has been a recent upsurge in the demand for sport,due to increase in heart disease. The favourite cultural passtime is visiting museums and the theatre.These are enjoyed by 50% of those questioned
